pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solve Rational Matrix Equation // Given a symmetric positive definite matrix Q and a non-singular matrix L, find symmetric positive definite solution X such that X = Q + L (X inv) L^T. Reference: Benner, P., Fabender, H. On the Solution of the Rational Matrix Equation. Benner, Fabender (2007) doi:10.1155/2007/21850.
